Package com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem

Class DefaultActionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.AnAction
      • com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.ActionGroup
        • com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.DefaultActionGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PossiblyDumbAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractNewProjectStep, AddServiceActionGroup, CheckResourcesAction.Group, CodeCompletionGroup, DefaultCompactActionGroup, EmptyActionGroup, ExternalSystemRunConfigurationMenu, IgnoreActionGroup, InspectionFilterAction, MoveProjectToGroupActionGroup, MvcActionGroup, NonEmptyActionGroup, NonTrivialActionGroup, OpenInNewTabActionGroup, ProjectGroupActionGroup, ProjectSpecificAction, ProjectWindowActionGroup, PyVariableViewSettings.VariablesPolicyGroup, RunDashboardFilterActionGroup, SmartPopupActionGroup, StandardVcsGroup, ToolWindowMoveAction.Group, ToolWindowViewModeAction.Group, UpdatableDefaultActionGroup, VcsActionGroup, VcsGroupsWrapper, VcsLogToolbarPopupActionGroup, VcsQuickListPopupAction.NonVcsAware, VcsQuickListPopupAction.VcsAware, XmlActionsGroup

    public class DefaultActionGroup
extends ActionGroup
    A default implementation of ActionGroup. Provides the ability to add children actions and separators between them. In most of the cases you will be using this implementation but note that there are cases (for example "Recent files" dialog) where children are determined on rules different than just positional constraints, that's when you need to implement your own ActionGroup.
    See Also:
    Constraints, ComputableActionGroup, NonEmptyActionGroup, NonTrivialActionGroup, SmartPopupActionGroup

        public final void add(AnAction action,
                      Constraints constraint)
        Adds the specified action with the specified constraint.
        Parameters:
        action - Action to be added; cannot be null
        constraint - Constraint to be used for determining action's position; cannot be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case when:
      • action is null
      • constraint is null
      • action is already in the group
